Strengthening of Prevention and Combat to Corruption in the Public Managment

description.narrative: This program will support the Government of Brazil's efforts to increase transparency and modernize the internal control of the Federal Branch. It will include support for agencies responsible for the activities of control and the promotion of public integrity and transparency.
